Reviews.Title: Be Ware
Reviews.Author: DM
Reviews.Content: I have this phone under a Page Plus/Verizon network. Please if you are considering buying a smartphone, this is not a choice. I have one, it hangs/freezes for hours! and cannot even turn off once frozen. After dialling a number, you have to wait for about 15-25 seconds before it can start dialing!!!! It was cheap, and I frankly regret having bought it. It is not worth your money

Reviews.Title: Save your money this is a terrible phone.
Reviews.Author: Marknmarti
Reviews.Content: This phone has been a nightmare. It makes calls in my pocket when its locked. The operating system is terribly slow. It seems to lock up every time I go to use it and I have to wait 10-15 seconds before the screen responds. I bought it new and have not downloaded or changed the settings. I hate the android operating system, you have to have a google account to do anything on the phone, even to use the calender. I suspect thats because google is keeping track of everything you do. This phone is a real piece of garbage. I use it on the page plus network which is a great company as far as coverage (verizon)but customer service is not very good. I use pageplusdirectdotcom and get my prepaid plan at a discount. Bottom lineDon't buy this phone.
